message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price. I think you'll really love it!
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm not sure I can meet you at $9000. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $11500?
I'm still interested in the product, but $11500 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. Can we meet somewhere in the middle?
